body:
Comment 3 by **shervinafshar**: 
Either way, we are looking at the sources of huge fetch traffic to this file on CLDR SVN
and there are direct fetches from the CLDR trunk in few code snippets or source files in
repositories like yours. So I thought to give you a shout out about this in case you
might be able to help with that.

If you run this once in a long time, then you can have a local version of the file
rather than having a hardcoded URL.
